subject: How to test code generated by iContract
msgSnippet: Hi All, A technique named as DbC (Design by Contract) is used specify preconditions & postconditions of a class & methods. DbC provides mechanism to write
messageBody:
Hi All,

A technique named as DbC (Design by Contract) is used specify
preconditions & postconditions of a class & methods. DbC provides
mechanism to write pre/post conditions in terms of special Javadoc
comments.

iContract is a tool which is used to verify code for Design by
Contract.

iContract takes Java code with special pre/post condition Javadoc
comments. It generates Java code having pre-processed code for
specified pre/post conditions.

Errors are will be thrown at runtime after preprocessed code is
executed alongwith Java code.

My questions are :
How to test the pre-processor code generated by iContract ?
What will be the related concerns in testing ?

Waiting for response...

Regards,
--- Shivprasad Mangesh Bhide
